title: Motion Med Sync Use Cases
subtitle: Functional use cases based on system requirements for user authentication, study access, data synchronization, and session management.

use_cases.title: Authenticate via Magic Link
use_cases.goal: Securely access the platform without a password
preconditions: User's email is registered in the system
main_flow: User enters email address on login page
System sends a single-use, time-limited magic link
User clicks the link within 10 minutes
User is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard
use_cases.success_criteria: User is logged in, session is established, and access is logged

use_cases.title: Manage Users (Administrator Only)
use_cases.goal: Create, deactivate, or assign roles to users
main_flow: Admin navigates to user management section
Admin creates or deactivates a user
Admin assigns user to relevant studies
use_cases.success_criteria: User is created or deactivated, and their access is scoped correctly

use_cases.title: Study Access Restriction
use_cases.goal: View only the studies the researcher is assigned to
preconditions: Researcher is logged in and assigned to at least one study
main_flow: Researcher logs in
Researcher views assigned studies
Attempting to view unauthorized study results in error
use_cases.success_criteria: Researcher can only see data for authorized studies

use_cases.title: Assign and Complete Participants
use_cases.goal: Assign participants to studies and mark them complete when done
main_flow: Admin assigns a participant to a study
When study or participant ends, admin marks them as completed
System disables further data updates and Garmin sync
use_cases.success_criteria: Participant and study are no longer editable; sync stops

use_cases.title: Sync Participant Data from Garmin
use_cases.goal: Automatically retrieve health and activity data from Garmin
preconditions: Participant is linked to a Garmin account
main_flow: Researcher links participant to Garmin
System verifies access and pulls data
Data is displayed and stored in the database
use_cases.success_criteria: Accurate Garmin data appears in participant profile

use_cases.title: Download Participant Data as CSV
use_cases.goal: Export study or participant data for offline analysis
preconditions: Researcher is assigned to the study
main_flow: Researcher selects study or participant
Chooses between summary or full data export
System generates CSV and initiates download
use_cases.success_criteria: Download completes, data matches expected format and calculations

use_cases.title: Automatic Logout
use_cases.goal: Maintain secure access by timing out idle or long-running sessions
main_flow: User logs in via magic link
After 15 minutes of inactivity, system shows warning
After 12 hours of total session time, system logs out regardless of activity
Closing the browser also triggers logout
use_cases.success_criteria: Session is terminated and user must reauthenticate
